org.trianacode.gui.help

Class CloseFrameEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.trianacode.gui.help.CloseFrameEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CloseFrameEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    A custom event class. This event is generated when the close frame widget is used or close has been chosen from the file menu of a frame.
    See Also:
    CloseFrameListener, Serialized Form
